<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_generative_ai_config"><sys_generative_ai_config action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><additional_configurations>{"skill_config_id":"7ef48083fbba9ad0c04cfbac7befdc38"}</additional_configurations><ai_suggested>false</ai_suggested><definition>a6f44c43fbba9ad0c04cfbac7befdcc6</definition><definition_table>sys_one_extend_capability_definition</definition_table><max_tokens>1000</max_tokens><min_word_count>-1</min_word_count><model>llm_generic</model><name>New</name><parent display_value="OneExtend Capability Definition: Factory Assist for Record Producers">d0017991fb2b1a10c04cfbac7befdc1c</parent><prompt>You are a ServiceNow developer. Create a JSON set for a ServiceNow record producer to serve a program with this description: {{service_description}} that provides the {{record_type}} function. Consider these fields: {{suggested_fields}}.

Render the output in a JSON format.

Return the JSON result and nothing else.

Ensure the JSON returned complies with this format, not all variable types don't have to be used and some variable types may be used more than once:{
    "{
        "description": "Description Examle",
        "title": "Title Example",
        "variables": [
            {
                "name": "masked_example",
                "type": "Masked",
                "label": "Masked Input Example",
                "defaultValue": "123-45-6789"
            },
            {
                "name": "multi_line_text_example",
                "type": "Multi Line Text",
                "label": "Multi Line Text Example",
                "defaultValue": "This is an example of a multi line text field."
            },
            {
                "name": "multiple_choice_example",
                "type": "Multiple Choice",
                "label": "Multiple Choice Example",
                "choices": [
                    {
                        "value": "option1",
                        "label": "Option 1"
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "option2",
                        "label": "Option 2"
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "option3",
                        "label": "Option 3"
                    }
                ]
            },
            {
                "name": "numeric_scale_example",
                "type": "Numeric Scale",
                "label": "Numeric Scale Example",
                "minValue": 0,
                "maxValue": 10,
                "defaultValue": 5
            },
            {
                "name": "reference_example",
                "type": "Reference",
                "label": "Reference Example",
                "referenceTable": "cmdb_ci_server",
                "referenceField": "name"
            },
            {
                "name": "requested_for_example",
                "type": "Requested For",
                "label": "Requested For Example"
            },
            {
                "name": "rich_text_label_example",
                "type": "Rich Text Label",
                "label": "Rich Text Label Example",
                "defaultValue": "<p>This is an example of a rich text label.</p>"
            },
            {
                "name": "select_box_example",
                "type": "Select Box",
                "label": "Select Box Example",
                "choices": [
                    {
                        "value": "option1",
                        "label": "Option 1"
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "option2",
                        "label": "Option 2"
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "option3",
                        "label": "Option 3"
                    }
                ]
            },
            {
                "name": "single_line_text_example",
                "type": "Single Line Text",
                "label": "Single Line Text Example",
                "defaultValue": "Example"
            },
            {
                "name": "ui_page_example",
                "type": "UI Page",
                "label": "UI Page Example",
                "uiPage": "example_ui_page"
            },
            {
                "name": "url_example",
                "type": "URL",
                "label": "URL Example",
                "defaultValue": "https://www.example.com"
            },
            {
                "name": "wide_single_line_text_example",
                "type": "Wide Single Line Text",
                "label": "Wide Single Line Text Example",
                "defaultValue": "Example"
            },
            {
                "name": "yes_no_example",
                "type": "Yes/No",
                "label": "Yes/No Example"
            },
            {
                "name": "attachment_example",
                "type": "Attachment",
                "label": "Attachment Example"
            },
            {
                "name": "break_example",
                "type": "Break",
                "label": "Break Example"
            },
            {
                "name": "checkbox_example",
                "type": "CheckBox",
                "label": "CheckBox Example"
            }
        ]
    } </prompt><prompt_template_role>user</prompt_template_role><request_tokens>15134</request_tokens><show_in_prompt_library>false</show_in_prompt_library><state>draft</state><sys_class_name>sys_generative_ai_config</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>john.spirko</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-02-05 06:16:55</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>c468b191fb6b1a10c04cfbac7befdc94</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>a6f44c43fbba9ad0c04cfbac7befdcc6</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="15-Minute Digital Product Prototype" source="x_snc_15_minute_se">9c753ca0479902504f6574fc416d43d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="15-Minute Digital Product Prototype">9c753ca0479902504f6574fc416d43d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_generative_ai_config_c468b191fb6b1a10c04cfbac7befdc94</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>john.spirko</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-02-05 06:16:55</sys_updated_on><temperature>0.2</temperature><version>4</version></sys_generative_ai_config></record_update>
